summary: Beatrix adds a standalone Vampire follower to your game. She is marriageable and is available as Calculated Level 45 or Auto Level from 8 to 82 in either Essential or Non-Essential form. She is also available with two styles of Apachii hair in Blonde, Brunette and Auburn. She is a Breton Race Vampire.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/12989-1-1344652078.jpg[/img]
[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/12989-1-1344654741.jpg[/img]

[b][size= 4][color= cornflowerblue]Required:[/b][/size][/color] 
[b][size= 3][color= RED][font= century gothic] 
Hair Option 1 requires ApachiiSkyHair 1.5
Hair Option 2 requires ApachiiSkyHairFemale_v_1_3 

[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/12989-1-1344622323.jpg[/img]
Use the direct link above for manual install or go to Apachii\'s page to use NMM option. This is a standalone file she just added and it is located below the main file in optional files.[/b][/size][/color][/font]

[b][size= 4][color= Cornflowerblue]Personal Stats:[/b][/size][/color] 
[b][size= 3][color= ghostwhite][font= century gothic]
Race: Breton Race Vampire
Voice: Hair 1 Female Young Eager Hair 2 Female Sultry
Hair: Black, Blonde or Auburn in two style options
[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/12989-2-1344661964.jpg[/img]
[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/12989-1-1344661964.jpg[/img]
Eyes: Black hair has Ice Blue Eyes, Blonde has Hazel Brown Eyes and Auburn has Dark Blue Eyes. 
Age: Early 20\'s
Location: Winterhold, Frozen Hearth Inn
Weight: 70% at the scale. If you use ADEC, UNPB or CBBE bodies with BBP she should be okay.
Height: 5\'10\" 
Inventory: She is equipped with one Ebony Dagger. She is nude without armor so you can outfit her with whatever you wish 
Combat: A mix of Vampire One Handed and Combat Necromage
Properties: She is available non-essential or essential and is marriageable.[/b][/size][/color][/font]
[b][color= cornflowerblue][size= 3][font= century gothic]To make her look like she does in my images; 
I used Bella\'s Better Females Main file then overwrote it with Makeup variant 1 and finally Bella\'s No Shine.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2812

Darker Neater Brows by Caliente
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666

The Eyes Of Beauty by Gabriel Mailhot for the best damn dark brown eyes on the Nexus! (IMHO)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13722

Her body in my images is CBBEv3 main body with Navetseas CBBE 1.8 body \"Toned Abs and Feminine Arms\"; and some images show her used with \"Glossy Skin for all female bodymod - v05 - No Gloss\" textures (removes sheen from her skin if you like that look). (She can be used with whatever body you prefer)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6554
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5437[/b][/size][/color][/font]

[b][size= 3][color= red]Note: Since she is created using the NPC Editor I removed each and every extra Apachii hair file from her. There should be no extra hairs in the \"showracemenu\" with this mod in use.[/b][/size][/color]


[b][size= 4]Thanks for checking out my mod and please endorse her if you like her! :) 

Warm regards,

FB[/b][/size]
author: FalmerBane

files.name: Beatrix Shadowfrost Calculated Level 40 Essential

files.name: Beatrix Shadowfrost Auto Level Non-Essential

files.name: Beatrix Shadowfrost Auto-Level Non-Essential Black Hair 1
files.fileName: Beatrix Shadowfrost Auto-Level Non-Essential Brunette Hair 1-16293-2-0.7z
files.changelogHtml:
I added 2 hairstyles in 3 colors and made minor tweaks to her face. (Only one option for each Auburn Hair Styles) Hair Option 1 uses Young Female Voice and Hair Option 2 uses Female Sultry Voice
Under Miscellaneous I added four non-vampire race versions of Beatrix as a Breton race companion that you can infect with various vampire overhauls found on the Nexus. All are set to essential...
